documentation.text: @dev Returns the erc staking token address.
@dev Returns the erc reward token address.
@dev Returns the staking duration.
@dev Returns the finish timestamp.
@dev Returns the updated at timestamp.
@dev Returns the reward rate in wei.
@dev Returns the reward rate per token stored in wei.
@dev Returns the total staked tokens in wei.
@dev Returns the amount of tokens owned by `account`.
@dev Last time reward applicable.
@dev Amount of reward per token staked.
@dev Total token has been earned.

@dev Transfers tokens from `buyer` to `staking` contract.
 @param amount Amount of token to stake.

Claim(address,uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when buyer claim the token rewards.

Stake(address,uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when buyer stake the tokens.

Withdraw(address,uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when buyer withdraw the tokens.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the amount of tokens owned by `account`.

params.amount: Amount of token to be set as reward.

rewardPerToken().details: Amount of reward per token staked.

rewardPerTokenStored().details: Returns the reward rate per token stored in wei.

rewardRate().details: Returns the reward rate in wei.

rewardToken().details: Returns the erc reward token address.

params.duration_: Duration of rewards to be paid out in seconds.

stakingToken().details: Returns the erc staking token address.

totalStaked().details: Returns the total staked tokens in wei.
